rooms.name: Living & Dining Area

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area. Includes a dining space and proper ventilation; designed for functionality with efficient workflow.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space on the ground floor, providing quiet retreat and intellectual stimulation. Located in the north-east to align with Vastu's knowledge zone.

rooms.name: Utility & Storage
rooms.description: Compact utility area for storage of cleaning supplies, pantry essentials, and other housekeeping items, strategically placed near the kitchen as per convenience.
